{"body": {"name": "Travel Stipend [REDACTED] Movement Tunisia - Bangkok, Nov. 2024", "summary": "My name is Walid Zaghdoudi, a cybersecurity engineer, and I am applying for a stipend to attend the [REDACTED] hackathon in Bangkok, traveling from Tunisia. I am collaborating with Amira Nasri, a blockchain developer, to develop NEARGPTAI Dev Tools\\\\u{2014}a project focused on integrating AI, chain abstraction, and enhanced security for the NEAR platform. Attending this event will allow us to collaborate with international peers, gain valuable insights, and contribute to the NEAR community.", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": "yarotska.near", "description": "**# Purpose**\\\\nI am requesting a $1000 stipend to support my participation in the [REDACTED] hackathon in Bangkok, Thailand.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n**# My Background and Contributions**\\\\nAs a cybersecurity engineer, I have contributed to advancing secure blockchain solutions and have engaged with the NEAR community to promote best practices in blockchain security. I previously collaborated with Amira to organize the AI Chain Near Tunisia Hackathon, which successfully brought together local developers to learn about and innovate on the NEAR platform.\\\\n\\\\n**# Travel Itinerary and Estimated Costs**\\\\n\\\\nDeparture: Tunis, Tunisia \\\\u{2192} Bangkok, Thailand (8th November)\\\\nReturn: Bangkok, Thailand \\\\u{2192} Tunis, Tunisia (14th November)\\\\n\\\\nFlights: $900 USD\\\\nVisa and Other Costs (Accommodation, Local Transport, etc.): $100 USD\\\\nTotal Estimated Cost: $1000 USD\\\\n\\\\n**# Project Plan**\\\\nAt the hackathon, Amira and I will work on NEARGPTAI Dev Tools, an AI-based project that aligns with the hackathon\\\\u{2019}s submission criteria. Our goal is to integrate AI, chain abstraction, and advanced security into the NEAR platform, creating scalable tools that enhance trust and encourage adoption. \\\\n\\\\nI am eager to attend this hackathon, connect with the global NEAR community, and contribute to the platform\\\\u{2019}s growth. I greatly appreciate your consideration and support.\\\\n\\\\nBest,\\\\nWalid Zaghdoudi", "linked_proposals": [116], "receiver_account": "zaghdoudiwalid.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "1000", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": ["Hackathon", "Travel expenses"], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 132011066}

{"id": 116, "body": {"name": "Travel Stipend [REDACTED] Movement Tunisia - Bangkok, Nov. 2024", "summary": "We are Amira Nasri, a blockchain developer, and Walid Zaghdoudi, a cybersecurity engineer, contributing to the NEAR ecosystem. We seek a stipend to attend [REDACTED] in Bangkok, traveling from Tunisia. Our goal is to develop NEARGPTAI Dev Tools, which will integrate AI, chain abstraction, and enhanced security on the NEAR platform. This project aims to create scalable and secure tools that drive adoption and strengthen user trust. Attending this event will allow us to collaborate globally", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": "yarotska.near", "description": "**Purpose**  \\\\nI am applying for an overseas travel stipend of $1000 to attend the [REDACTED] hackathon in Bangkok, Thailand.\\\\n\\\\n**My Records**  \\\\nAs a blockchain developer, I have actively organized workshops to teach NEAR technology in Tunisia, helping to educate and engage the local developer community. I also organized the AI Chain Near Tunisia hackathon and participated in NEARCON 2022 on Portugal, NEARCON IRL online.\\\\n[NEARCON IRL Hackathon](https://nearcon-hackathon.devpost.com/) : [Submission (https://devpost.com/software/elaco) \\\\n[AI Chain NEAR Tunisia Hackathon \\\\n](https://taikai.network/hackbox/hackathons/ai-chain-near-tunisia?token=Q05VQK5GBHLM8C8U)\\\\n\\\\n**Travel Itinerary and Estimated Costs**  \\\\n- **Departure:** Tunis, Tunisia \\\\u{2192} Bangkok, Thailand (8th November)  \\\\n- **Return:** Bangkok, Thailand \\\\u{2192} Tunis, Tunisia (14th November)\\\\n\\\\n**Estimated Costs Breakdown** \\\\n- **Flights:** $900 USD  \\\\n- **Visa and Other Costs (Accommodation, Local Transport, etc.):** $100  \\\\n- **Total Estimated Cost:** $1000 USD  \\\\n\\\\n**Project Plan**  \\\\nAt the hackathon, Walid and I will develop **NEARGPTAI Dev Tools**, an AI-based project that aligns with the event\\\\\\'s submission criteria. Our goal is to integrate AI, chain abstraction, and enhanced security on the NEAR platform, creating scalable tools that enhance user trust and drive adoption. I will update this proposal once our project is submitted.\\\\n\\\\n**Project Submission**  \\\\n[Devpost Redacted Submission \\\\n](https://devpost.com/software/neargpt-ai-tools)\\\\n\\\\nI\\\\u{2019}m excited to attend this event and would greatly appreciate your support. We look forward to connecting with the NEAR community in Bangkok!\\\\n\\\\nBest,  \\\\nAmira Nasri", "linked_proposals": [121], "receiver_account": "alae.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "1000", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": ["Hackathon", "Travel expenses"]}

{"id": 69, "body": {"name": "Travel Stipend [REDACTED] - Bangkok, Nov. 2024", "summary": "I am building a location-based dating game - with heavy generative AI and NEAR integration. Goal is to get more people on-chain. I am a former MetaBUILD winner and have participated in multiple NEAR hackathons before.", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": null, "description": "### Hackathon entry\\\\n\\\\nIdea was to do something fun, something that would bring more people into crypto. My entry will be a **location-based dating game** with heavy AI and NEAR integration. In the MVP of the app the location will be set to Bangkok.\\\\n\\\\n### Former hackathons\\\\n\\\\n* MetaBUILD II 1st place prize winner (https://devpost.com/software/voog?ref_content=my-projects-tab&ref_feature=my_projects)\\\\n* MetaBUILD III participant with 2 projects (ADA - Autonomous Decentralized Accountant, https://devpost.com/software/ada-the-blockchain-accountant, Near JS SDK wrapper for NodeJS https://devpost.com/software/near-node-compiler)\\\\n* ETHGlobal (EthOnline) entry: 0xLeague - decentralized marketplace for audits (https://ethglobal.com/showcase/0xleague-by25h)\\\\n\\\\n### Travel itinerary\\\\n\\\\nTravelling from Estonia, flying through Finland to Bangkok. Looking for a stipend to cover 100% of flight and travel tickets. Lodging, food etc would be covered by me.", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "toolblox.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "1000", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": ["Hackathon"]}
